ygData.subject: RE: Re: Bards vs. casters, melee, etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... When the enchanter speedup overrode, I still got the stat bonus from the song.  I did not test whether I could cancel an enchanter speedup by playing a
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 18 Nov 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> would be nice to know. also, are there any cancellation effects? will our
> songs cancel the enchanter's spell, or just give the stat bonuses of the
> song without the attack speedup?

When the enchanter speedup overrode, I still got the stat
bonus from the song. I did not test whether I could cancel an
enchanter speedup by playing a faster bard speedup.
Augmentation + Warsong would seem the best candidates for that
test.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
